content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started, may I please have your name?
Thanks, Mike! Could you please provide the address where you need the service?
Thank you for the address, Mike. Let me check if this location is within our service area.
I'm sorry, Mike, but it seems there is an issue with the address you provided. Could you please double-check or provide additional details?
No, that's right. I live at 1234 Elm St, Springfield. Maybe you can't find it?

Thank you for confirming. Unfortunately, due to a technical issue, Iâ€™m unable to verify the service availability at that address right now. I will escalate this to one of our human operators to assist you further. Please hold on a moment.
